message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $15000 to you and I believe it's an excellent investment. My first offer for this product is $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $9000 for the product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $10500 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $10000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $9750 for the product.
Considering the high value of the product and your interest, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $9875 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $9700 for the product.
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your offer, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $9800 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $9650 for the product.
